<b>Description:</b> <br>


Welcome to my website. I am a PhD candidate in Economics at University of Ottawa in Canada. I am in my sixth year of the PhD program.<br>

<b>Research interests:</b> <br>

My research interests are in macroeconomics, international economics, and applied Econometrics.<br> 
I would also like to work in the fields related to Monetary Economics.
